arts.ttl: Arne Slot namechecks 'outstanding' Liverpool player who impressed 'everyone in the stadium'
arts.sum: Arne Slot spoke about Liverpool's performance after the 2-2 draw against Fulham, in which they played most of the game with 10 men

arts.ttl: Slot praises ‘outstanding’ Liverpool after comeback draw with Fulham
arts.sum: Jota strike levels it up after Robertson red card ‘I’m very happy. I couldn’t have asked for more’ Arne Slot said he could not have asked for more from the 10 men of Liverpool after they fought back from Andy Robertson’s early red card and two Fulham leads to salvage a draw. Liverpool dropped points for the second Premier League game in succession but Slot, who was highly critical of his team’s performance in the Champions League win at Girona on Tuesday, was full of praise for his players’ efforts against Marco Silva’s side. Diogo Jota, making his first appearance in almost two months because of injury, scored Liverpool’s second equaliser in the 86th minute to extend the league leaders’ unbeaten run to 19 matches. arts.ttl: How 'brave' Fulham & 'fighting' Liverpool earned deserved draw
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundits Ashley Williams and Theo Walcott discuss how "brave" Fulham and "fighting" Liverpool both delivered strong performances during their 2-2 draw at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Liverpool ‘almost unstoppable’ as Fulham leave Anfield disappointed
arts.sum: Earning a point away to Liverpool at would usually be a cause for celebration for most teams, but Fulham were left feeling like they let one get away at Anfield. arts.ttl: Hits and misses: Arsenal need a No 9 as Liverpool show title fight
arts.sum: For the second Premier League fixture in a row, after their 1-1 draw with Fulham, Arsenal were left to rue a failure to turn dominance into goals. But that total includes only five in the Premier League and he never looked like scoring on Saturday, registering a solitary shot across the 90 minutes.

arts.ttl: “We’ll see” – Liverpool, Arsenal, Chelsea & Newcastle all on alert after €30m star’s latest comments
arts.sum: Rayan Cherki has refused to rule out a move away from Lyon in the near future, with a host of Premier League clubs showing an interest. Cherki has caught the eye with the French giants in recent years, registering 22 goals and 31 assists in 157 appearances across all competitions since emerging in 2019. arts.ttl: 'Do you think?!' - Fulham boss explodes at journalist's red card question after Liverpool draw
arts.sum: Liverpool were held to a 2-2 draw against Fulham in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon

arts.ttl: Slot proud of Liverpool fightback after Robertson's early red card
arts.sum: Arne Slot expressed pride in his Liverpool players as they twice battled back from going a goal down to claim a point in a 2-2 draw with Fulham at Anfield despite being down to 10 men. Slot said an early injury to Robertson had affected his team and possibly the player in making the mistake that earned him a red card for denying a goalscoring opportunity.

arts.ttl: Slot thrilled with Liverpool despite Fulham draw
arts.sum: Liverpool boss Arne Slot was unhappy with a narrow Champions League victory at Girona but on Saturday the Dutchman was delighted with their resilience in a draw against Fulham.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah reaches huge new Liverpool milestone in Fulham draw
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah recorded his 100th assist for Liverpool in the 2-2 draw with Fulham.
